text:
"JoJo's Bizarre Adventure" is a Japanese manga series created by Hirohiko Araki. The manga, which began in 1987, currently has 8 parts with each part focusing on a different member of the Joestar family. Part 3 (named "Stardust Crusaders") was adapted into a 13 episode OVA (Original Video Animation) series released between 1993 and 2002. An anime adaptation of the manga by David Productions started airing in 2012.
Characters.
See List of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure characters
